definitions.body: alloy, tin, dross (orig. that which is separated from precious metal; cf. Plin.:Hist. Nat. xxiv. 16, xxxiii. 9)—´[[בּ]] abs. Nu 31:22 + 4 t.; Pl. sf. [[בְּדִילָָיִח]] Is 1:25; —
alloy, Is 1:25 fig. of evil of Jerusalem, which ´[[י]] will remove ([[הֵסִיר]]; ‖[[סִגָָיִח]]).

tin (plumbum album) Nu 31:22 (P; + [[זׇהָב]], [[כֶּסֶף]], [[נְחשֶׁת]], [[בַּרְזֶל]], [[עׂפָָרֶת]]); fig. of Isr. Ez Eze 22:18 (+ [[נְחשֶׁת]], [[בַּרְזֶל]], [[עוֹפֶרֶת]]); in simile v:Eze 22:20 (+ id. + [[כֶּסֶף]]); as article of commerce brought to Tyre from Tarshish Ez Eze 27:12 (+ [[כֶּסֶף]], [[בַּרְזֶל]], [[עוֹפֶרֶת]]).
